```
doge:
 user.present:
 - fullname: much doge 
 - shell: /bin/bash
 - home: /home/doge
```

```
{% for user in [dsala, eflores, elilu] %}
{{ user }}:
user.present:
 - home: /home/{{ user }}
 - shell: /bin/bash
```

```
dsala@master1:~$ salt ‘*’  cmd.run ‘ls /home’
minion-1:
 jdoe
 dev1
master:
 dsala 
 eflores
```
